Combining the lantern frame with the lamp does not require a furnace or an anvil. The oil lantern must be filled with lamp oil before it can be lit.

The oil lantern is the second best light source in the game (requiring 26 Firemaking to light), only inferior to the Bullseye lantern. Combining the lantern frame with the lamp does not require a furnace or an anvil. The oil lantern must be filled with lamp oil before it can be lit.

The '''oil lantern''' is the second best [[Light sources|light source]] in the game (requiring 26 [[Firemaking]] to light), only inferior to the [[Bullseye lantern]]. Combining the lantern frame with the lamp does not require a [[furnace]] or an [[anvil]]. The oil lantern must be filled with [[lamp oil]] before it can be lit.
